data.actual_result: Spellcheck treats it as two different words and only has a redline on the letters before and/or after the punctuation and only gives you option to correct those letters and not the word itself
data.expected_result: The entire word should have a redline under it and should give you options to correct the typo
data.short_description: Spellcheck seems to treat a word as two words if there's a wrong punctuation.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type any word with a punctuation in it (should not be an apostrophe) such as `l;ife`, `l;ook`, `m,ine`, `p[ine` etc - Attempt to correct the typo you've made
